"Xiera": "The Dual Blade Weapon Action also creates <red>\"Photon Blades\"<c> when you use it."
"Try using the Weapon Action to hit an enemy with Photon Blades."

"・Use <%WeaponAction> and hit the enemy with
\u3000Photon Blades"

"・Use <%MainPaletteC> and hit the enemy with
\u3000Photon Blades"

"If you have learned the Class Skill \"Dual Blade Gear\", a Gear Gauge will be added to the top of your Main Palette.

The Gear Gauge fills when you hit enemies with Dual Blade attacks."

"By performing a Weapon Action, you can fire Photon Blades towards the target.

Attacking the part where Photon Blades have stuck into the enemy will restore additional PP and increase the amount of Gear you gain."
